des: "This is my own recipe. I like experimenting with different ingredients, so this is what i came up with. Its excellent on ribs, but can be used on brisket or pulled pork as well. Enjoy!"
ins: Combine brown sugar, cumin, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, chili powder, onion powder, kosher salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper, ginger, and celery seed in a large bowl; mix with your hands to break up and chunks of brown sugar.
